Player History
Drafted in 16th round, 245th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/10/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/11/2017 to a 5-year deal worth $5,800,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/19/2017 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 10/2/2018 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Released by Detroit on 8/24/2019...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/4/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
10/5/2020: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $1,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
